column2: I have been imprisoned and my future looks grim, but as a woman of child-bearing age I have a possible way to be released...
No, such an action would be sinful.
Will try to seduce her way to freedom.
One of your prisoners, [From.GetBestName], has approached you with a request to be released from prison, and she promises to be very grateful indeed.
I'll have her brought to my bedchamber tonight...
Will have [From.GetBestName] share his bed before setting her free.
After a night of guilty pleasures, I am finally released. \nA free woman once more.
My request to be released has been denied.
Though I have been scarred for life, I have recovered somewhat.
Aside from a hideous scar, there was no lasting damage!
I have not come away undamaged, and have been marred for life.
